item.description:
"Yazmin's Cafe Madrid has two very special nights of entertainment.  Friday we have DJ Avalon with the finest in late night song, dancing, karaoke and wonderful music for late night enjoyment in our Havana Room. Avalon will perform for you from 8pm until midnight this Friday."

 

We haven't been to Cafe Madrid in a while, we always loved it, so join us for Karaoke and dancing there, with KJ Avalon! 

I met him while he was being 'just' a singer at Nan King in Hudson and he was a hoot!  He fit right in with the Meetup group. ;-)

I'll try to get there a little early to secure tables.  The food is good there too, you can eat earlier in the other room and look for us as the night starts!

Tom D'A cell 603-521-8392
item.name: Karaoke and Dancing Friday @Cafe Madrid, Chelmsford
